manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A to Z Support A powerful multivitamin and mineral is a great way to provide foundational nutritional support or cover gaps in your child’s diet! Big Benefits Our quality formula is designed to provide essential nutrients that help support healthy immune system function, energy levels, bones, teeth, and more! Kids Love ‘Em! Delicious natural black cherry flavored, easy-to-take chewables make taking their daily multi more of a treat than a chore! Trusted Brand Formulated without yeast or artificial colors and made in our own facility where we can manage the production process to provide the best possible quality.

Children’s Vitamins & Minerals Cover the bases and fuel their life! Whether you have a picky eater or just want to make sure to cover any gaps in your child’s diet, a daily multi-vitamin and -mineral is a great way to provide foundational nutritional support. Made from quality ingredients, Solaray Children’s Vitamins and Minerals provides significant amounts of the essential nutrients they need. In addition to a healthy diet, our powerful multi is intended to help support your child’s immune system, growth, energy, bones, teeth, muscle function, and much more. But a good multi isn’t just about what’s in it – it’s about what’s not in it as well. Solaray Children’s Vitamins and Minerals is formulated without yeast or artificial colors. And with a delicious natural black cherry flavor, our convenient, easy-to-take chewables are designed to make your child’s supplementation more of a treat than a chore! Superior Ingredients Vitamin A (as Retinyl Palmitate)(Supplying 5,000 IU of Vitamin A), Vitamin C (as Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin D (as Cholecalciferol)(D-3)(Supplying 400 IU of Vitamin D), Vitamin E (as d-Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate)(Supplying 30 IU of Vitamin E), Thiamine (as Thiamine Mononitrate)(B-1), Riboflavin (Vitamin B-2), Niacin (as Niacinamide), Vitamin B-6 (as Pyridoxine HCl), Folic Acid, Vitamin B-12 (as Cyanocobalamin), Biotin, Pantothenic Acid (as Calcium D-Pantothenate), Calcium (from Oyster Shell), Iron (as Ferrous Fumarate), Iodine (from Kelp), Magnesium (as Magnesium Oxide), Zinc (as Zinc Gluconate), Manganese (as Manganese Gluconate), Potassium (as Potassium Citrate), Inositol, Bioflavonoid Concentrate (from Citrus), PABA (Para-Aminobenzoic Acid), Choline (as Choline Bitartrate) Other Ingredients: Sorbitol, Fructose, Natural Cherry Flavor with other Natural Flavors, Mono- and Diglycerides, Vegetable Oil, Magnesium Stearate, Silica, Natural Food Coloring and Stearic Acid *These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

In 1973, Solaray began to formulate herbal blends for specific health benefits. Over the years, Solaray pioneered many innovative products and has become a trusted full-line dietary supplement brand found in health and natural food stores all around the world. True to our commitment to stay leading edge in powerful supplementation, we are proud to offer our Children’s Vitamins & Minerals. Our Quality Confidence in the Solaray name is just one of the reasons we’ve been around so long and maintain our place as a leader in the industry. Unlike many other companies, we manufacture almost all our own products, which gives us the ability to ensure raw ingredients meet our unparalleled standards. If they don’t, we send them back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 3 & 5yr olds love them!
reviews.reviewText: My toddlers like the flavor, they’re not chalky, stay in their original shape without breaking down into powder, trusted brand, affordable. Good find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! A Natural Vitamin that tastes great!
reviews.reviewText: The ingredients are exactly what I was looking for in a chewable and the flavor is great. My daughter loves these! We tried another brand of chewable high-quality vitamin that was twice the price, put they tasted sour and chalky. (I’m eating those so they aren’t wasted, and they are yucky 🤢) My daughter now reminds me if I forget to give her a vitamin! I tried one and agree, they taste great. The only problem is she wants more than one 😅. I keep them hidden so she won’t eat the whole bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Doctor Recommended these (I'm an adult)
reviews.reviewText: I love these! I was having a hard time keeping up with my daily swallow vitamin when my doctor recommended these. She attested that they taste good and I agree! I take two a day and my last blood test showed I had all the sufficient vitamins. I'm a vegetarian so it's important for me to get my b vitamins in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great ingredients... Not so great taste
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an alternative to gummy vitamins without paying the price of our beloved juice plus.I grabbed a bottle of these for my child. While they check most of the boxes for nutrients, they "do not taste good" ... Will not be ordering again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for a new brand of children's chewable vitamins (not gummies!). Both of my picky kids liked the cherry flavor and I'm pleased with the vitamins and minerals in the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best natural supplement for children.
reviews.reviewText: The children love the favor of this vitamin. It has every nutrients your children needs. I will buy more. Highly recommend it to family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Taste is not good... bland & chalky.I bought these because I can't take adult vitamins. They upset my stomach. I will not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of different vitamins and minerals AND iron!
reviews.reviewText: I was pleased to find this supplement after looking through many different products. My son needs iron but many of the iron included supplements were lacking in other vital minerals and vitamins. Some reviews stated they did not like the flavor. I was hesitant but so glad I decided to try this one. My son loves the flavor and looks forward to taking his supplements every day. The product is affordable and you get lots of nutrients for your buck.
